title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 314 - Implementation Of State Environmental Quality Review Act
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 314 - Implementation Of State Environmental Quality Review Act

State Regulations
§ 314.1 - Authority and purpose
§ 314.2 - Definitions
§ 314.3 - General procedure
§ 314.4 - Responsibilities
§ 314.5 - Procedures prior to the preparation of draft environmental impact statements
§ 314.6 - Notices of completion of draft environmental impact statements and public hearings and notices thereof
§ 314.7 - Final environmental impact statement procedures
§ 314.8 - Projects involving federal participation
§ 314.9 - Projects undertaken or approved prior to the effective date(s) of article 8 of the environmental conservation law
§ 314.10 - Filing of state environmental quality review documents

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 314

Statutory authority: Education Law, §355; Environmental

Conservation Law, art. 8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
